channel.title: Your ideas if there is Half-life 3
channel.description:
What do you think will happen next if there will be a HL3. What people and places there will be or what will happen to Gordon and Gman?
What do you think will happen in HL3? Make your prediction

item.title: Your ideas if there is Half-life 3
item.dc:creator: _rot_fodder
item.description:
Doom300:

Shut up, you have no friends. Jeez. You can’t take a fucking joke, not once.

well, either your a douchebag or you are a complete moron, because the stupidity that is just constantly being spilled out of your account is nigh unprecedented. I will assume that you are an amature troll and not a complete moron because I don’t think it is possible to be honestly as stuipd and immature as you have been, lately.

please go back to troll school and brush up on your tactics, they are embarrasing.

EDIT: ON TOPIC: Episode three will almost certainly be in arctic territory, and I expect we will not be seeing many headcrabs or any aliens that we are used to, with the exception of combine.

item.title: Your ideas if there is Half-life 3
item.dc:creator: Orpheon
item.description:
eateroftheflame:

That timeline is very conjectural, it’s already been proven wrong about when portal takes place.

Well, I know it’s not perfect, but it’s the best summary of the entire story I could find. Do you know of any better ones? If there’s a more correct one I’d like to know for future reference.

Read full topic
item.source: Your ideas if there is Half-life 3

item.title: Your ideas if there is Half-life 3
item.dc:creator: eateroftheflame
item.description:
Orpheon:

If you haven’t read this yet, you should, it’s very informative. It’s not the end-all-be-all Half Life story reference, since there are some things no one knows for sure but Valve, but it explains everything known about the story and makes good guesses about the rest.

That timeline is very conjectural, it’s already been proven wrong about when portal takes place.

Read full topic

item.source: Your ideas if there is Half-life 3

item.title: Your ideas if there is Half-life 3
item.dc:creator: Orpheon
item.description:
rorriMAesU:

All the times I played HL I just figured all the creatures were just from the xen dimension…I never knew aliens were involved. No wonder the combine seemed so out of place to me lol. Regardless, I wish there was more variation to the combine, I guess repetition and little variation are my only complaints. Whats the explanation behind the ant lions? When did this become starship troopers, HL2 is still set on earth right?

The Vorts do rule, I agree. I just prefer fighting them, I thought they made an excellent foe lol.

I also agree that valve shouldn’t have just remade HL, it was sensible to be finished with BM. I know I am not very creative and wouldn’t come up with a good plot, I simply didn’t get where the alien plot line came from until you mentioned their inclusion in HL1.

Id really like to know EXACTLY where the R.C. sample came from…or have they already answered that? lol

If you haven’t read this yet, you should, it’s very informative. It’s not the end-all-be-all Half Life story reference, since there are some things no one knows for sure but Valve, but it explains everything known about the story and makes good guesses about the rest.

Read full topic

item.title: Your ideas if there is Half-life 3
item.dc:creator: rorriMAesU
item.description:
Orpheon:

First of all, aliens were always involved. You killed alien wildlife and soldiers in Black Mesa, and more alien wildlife and an alien overlord on Xen.

Second, the vorts rule.

Third, Valve had to take a new direction with HL2, whatever it might be and however people recieved it. The ending makes it clear you’re done with Black Mesa and going on to new things. Besides, just making HL1 over again wouldn’t be fun or interesting for the devs or the players. Oh…wait…

All the times I played HL I just figured all the creatures were just from the xen dimension…I never knew aliens were involved. No wonder the combine seemed so out of place to me lol. Regardless, I wish there was more variation to the combine, I guess repetition and little variation are my only complaints. Whats the explanation behind the ant lions? When did this become starship troopers, HL2 is still set on earth right?

The Vorts do rule, I agree. I just prefer fighting them, I thought they made an excellent foe lol.

I also agree that valve shouldn’t have just remade HL, it was sensible to be finished with BM. I know I am not very creative and wouldn’t come up with a good plot, I simply didn’t get where the alien plot line came from until you mentioned their inclusion in HL1.

Id really like to know EXACTLY where the R.C. sample came from…or have they already answered that? lol

Read full topic

item.source: Your ideas if there is Half-life 3

item.title: Your ideas if there is Half-life 3
item.dc:creator: Orpheon
item.description:
rorriMAesU:

/slight rant
I also did not like the turn HL2 took with the story, I just thought involving aliens was a poor decision. I would not have minded if they were written in and implemented better, than again I only played the episodes once and really didn’t pay too much attention. I kind of lost interest in the story and I know the time waiting between episodes didn’t help; I didn’t find much replay value in the episodes. Oh and I hate how the vortigaunts are now allies.

Maybe the HL1 story is too awesome to contend with…and difficult to continue.

First of all, aliens were always involved. You killed alien wildlife and soldiers in Black Mesa, and more alien wildlife and an alien overlord on Xen.

Second, the vorts rule.

Third, Valve had to take a new direction with HL2, whatever it might be and however people recieved it. The ending makes it clear you’re done with Black Mesa and going on to new things. Besides, just making HL1 over again wouldn’t be fun or interesting for the devs or the players. Oh…wait…

Read full topic

item.source: Your ideas if there is Half-life 3

item.title: Your ideas if there is Half-life 3
item.dc:creator: rorriMAesU
item.description:
Doom300 is just a douche-bag and immediately steered this thread towards retarded…

I do hope the HL3 engine implements 100% destructive environments, realistic physics/ragdolling, real-time lighting, different gibbing/gore (but not l4d over the top), improved character damage reaction (limping, independent limb damage). I personally have no speculations on what will happen in HL3, I just hope it doesn’t involve combine and antlions, perhaps my least favorite enemies…ever lol.

/slight rant
I also did not like the turn HL2 took with the story, I just thought involving aliens was a poor decision. I would not have minded if they were written in and implemented better, than again I only played the episodes once and really didn’t pay too much attention. I kind of lost interest in the story and I know the time waiting between episodes didn’t help; I didn’t find much replay value in the episodes. Oh and I hate how the vortigaunts are now allies.

Maybe the HL1 story is too awesome to contend with…and difficult to continue.

Read full topic
